product.description: This product leverages AI to transform customer data into actionable insights, allowing businesses to precisely track their top-performing distribution channels at a granular level, from initial clicks to completed onboarding.

features.name: AI-driven Insights
features.description: Utilizes artificial intelligence to analyze customer data and generate powerful insights.

features.name: Granular Channel Tracking
features.description: Tracks distribution channels with high precision, covering every click, download, and onboarding action.

product.targeted_market: Businesses that rely on digital marketing and app distribution, particularly those looking to optimize their marketing spend and understand customer acquisition journeys.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The difficulty in attributing marketing efforts to actual customer acquisition and engagement, and the lack of clear visibility into the performance of different distribution channels.
